tool_description: Calculates expanded uncertainty by applying coverage factor to combined standard uncertainty, determining appropriate k-factor based on degrees of freedom and confidence level.
error_messages: Invalid combined uncertainty: Must be positive number.
Invalid degrees of freedom: Must be positive number.
Invalid coverage factor: Manual coverage factor must be positive.
Low degrees of freedom warning: DOF < 10 may result in large coverage factors.
usage: Provide combined uncertainty and effective degrees of freedom. Tool determines appropriate coverage factor and calculates expanded uncertainty for specified confidence level.
